Class BlockListRepository

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.repository.BlockListRepository
public class BlockListRepository extends Object
Repository class to manage Block entities. Handles loading, saving, and searching blocks by various attributes.
